projects.title: Simple Pinterest
projects.description: A simple mock up of the look and functionality of Pinterest. A project that introduced us to using Promises
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, JSON, Modules, Promises

projects.title: Shotz
projects.description: How to find the best locations for your movie shots! Used promises and JSON.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, JSON, Modules, Promises

projects.title: What You See Is What You Get
projects.description: DOM manipulation using Javascript, event listeners, and JSON files

projects.title: Thrones
projects.description: A Game of Thrones site where you can sort characters based on their house. Project utilized to give us more experience with JS event listeners

projects.title: Adoption Website
projects.description: An adoption website where you are able to sort based on pet type (cat, dino, dog, or all). Very similar to the Thrones project in that it gave us more experience with event listeners.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

projects.title: Sorting Hat
projects.description: A project that brings Hogwarts' Sorting Hat to life!
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

projects.title: Language Translator
projects.description: An app that uses a limited dictionary and then translates a holiday card message from English into another language.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
